doc:
Robby Benson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robby_Benson 0 Robin David Segal (born January 21, 1956), known by the stage name Robby Benson, is an American actor, musician, singer, director, producer and educator. He is known as the voice of Beast in the Disney animated film Beauty and the Beast and its numerous sequels and spin-offs, and directed several episodes of the sitcom Friends. Robin_David_Segal ( born January_21_,_1956 ) , known by the_stage_name_Robby_Benson , is an_American_actor , musician_,_singer_,_director_,_producer_and_educator . He is_known as the_voice of Beast in the_Disney_animated_film_Beauty and the_Beast and its_numerous_sequels_and_spin-offs , and directed several_episodes of the_sitcom_Friends .
